tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT,
    data_key VARCHAR(50),
    encrypted_data TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, data_key),
    CONSTRAINT user_data_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    accessed_at TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT access_logs_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    tx_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    tx_type VARCHAR(50),
    tx_data JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT blockchain_transactions_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
    key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT encryption_keys_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);
